More faces than spaces
Workplace parking is broken
Parking problems

Does this sound like your workplace parking situation?

  • Got more staff than parking spaces?
  • Is juggling staff and visitor parking a daily hassle?
  • Want to make the most of your valuable parking assets?

If you’re an Auckland business with limited parking, PARKALOTT can help you make the most of your spaces. It’s an easy-to-use solution which doesn’t require expensive on-site hardware - and it’s available from as little as $50 a month.

Using your workplace parking more fairly and maximising occupancy has a number of benefits for your business:

Happier staff Lorem ipsum

No empty spaces Lorem ipsum

Save time Less parking administration more time spent on your business
